channel.title: Summon-Pkz Client V5
channel.description:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/logo4ch9-1.jpg[/img]
I've been working on this, Ever since the Start of Remaking my server, into It's V6 Version, Which Still Isn't finished, it has ALOT of work still to be done, along with some more work on this client, But I have decided to release it now. Once The server is finished, this Client will be compatible with it, so By all means, Join my server when It is finished. Find out the details on how to Get on it yourself, I am not posting it here.
Download Link is at bottom, Read all Information, and Look at all pictures beflre downloading.
[b][u]General Features[/u][/b]
[ul][li]Fixed 9/10 Bug's/Glitches from last client.[/li] [li]Fixed GameFrame, Does not now have a black Map.[/li] [li]Removed Log-out door.[/li] [li]New BackGround, Created by me.[/li] [li]Full Prayer HeadIcons.[/li] [li]Login Box now matches With the BackGround.[/li] [li]377 Cache.[/li] [li]Added 5 New objects.[/li] [li]Added loads of New Items.[/li] [li]Added Loads of New NPC's.[/li] [li]Includes the Warrior Guild Animated Armours & Armour Animator Object.[/li] [li]FULL Music Player, There is already A song in the Client.[/li] [li]Added new menu's on the JFrame.[/li] [li]Added a No-Clip Option on the JFrame, which works even if you are not a Moderator/Administrator.[/li] [li]New HP Bar.[/li] [li]New Vengeance.[/li][/ul]
[u][b]New Items[/b][/u]
[ul][li]Ava's Accumilator.[/li] [li]Summoning Hat.[/li] [li]ONE Summoning Pouch (Spirit Wolf), I am not giving you them all.[/li] [li]Warrior Guild Tokens.[/li] [li]ALL Of the defenders (Only had Rune defender before).[/li] [li]Combat Braclet [4], The Colouring is a bit off, but it's Ok.[/li] [li]ALL Bolts.[/li] [li]Removed Blessed D'Hides, Models were messed up.[/li][/ul]
[u][b] New NPC's[/b][/u]
[ul][li]ALL Animated Armours All the way up to Rune.[/li] [li]Some Summoning NPC's[/li][/ul]
[u][b]New Object's[/b][/u]
[ul][li]There are about 5 Object's That, If placed In the right places, and Facing the right ways, Make the Armour Animator Object.[/li] [li]Summoning Obelisk.[/li][/ul]
[u][b] New GFX's[/b][/u]
[ul][li]New Vengeance (GIF Animation further down).[/li] [li]More GodSword Special Attack's.[/li][/ul]
[u][b]PICTURES[/b][/u]
Client BackGround:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Client-1.jpg[/img]
GameFrame:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/GameFrame-1.jpg[/img]
Summoning NPC's:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Icetitan.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Mosstitan.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/SpiritKalphite.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/steeltitan.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Wolf.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Bear.jpg[/img]
Void with Ava's Accumilator:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/voidandaccumilator.jpg[/img]
Summoning Obelisk:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/SummonObelisk.jpg[/img]
Animated Armours & Animator Object:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/AnimatedArmours.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/animarmour.gif[/img]
New Vengeance:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/veng.gif[/img]
Elegant:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Elegant.jpg[/img]
[size=15pt][b][u]Some SkillCape Masters Pictures (NOT ALL ARE SHOWN)[/u][/b][/size]
Agility:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/AgilMaster.jpg[/img]
Cooking:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Cookmaster.jpg[/img]
Farming:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Farmmaster.jpg[/img]
Strength:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Strmaster.jpg[/img]
Magic & RC:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/SkillcapeMasters.jpg[/img]
Dragon Impling:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Impling.jpg[/img]
Armadyl GodSword Special Attack GFX:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/AGSSpec.gif[/img]
Saradomin GodSword Special attack GFX:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Saraspec-1.gif[/img]
Prayer HeadIcons:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Prayer.jpg[/img]
_______________________________________________________________________________
_______________________________________________________________________________
_______________________________________________________________________________
Finally The Virus Scan:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Scan-1.jpg[/img]
Download:
[url=http://files.filefront.com/Summon+Pkz+Client+Version5rar/;11412641;/fileinfo.html][img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/download_button.jpg[/img][/url]
Enjoy.
[size=15pt]Post if you Read/Download.[/size]

item.title: Summon-Pkz Client V5
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

Three words: Auto Cache downloading.
Basically, you have posted a great client, but it lacks the feature which most users look for, like most clients.
Im sorry, but I think we can agree playing a webclient is a damn lot easier than downloading a huge rar file, extracting then running from a batch file (which can also be used to destroy your computer easily). I love the godsword emotes and nice warriors guild. Please release the server too!

Read full topic
